channel.title: Changing Mastermind
channel.description: Currently, the Evil faction has huge problems if the Assassin gets occupied. Also, Mastermind is dead weight if nobody can be converted anymore. I propose these abilities to be added to the Mastermind: Ability: Backstab Type: Day. Uses:1 Description:Prepare to kill the Assassin at night instantly. They can be replaced, and the new assassin can kill that night. (to depose occupied assassins) Ability: Retire. Type:Day. Uses: 1 Description: Turn into Assassin. Only avaliable if there is no assassin. (Last ditch try if you somehow survived all assassins and suddenly face only unconvertables)

item.title: Changing Mastermind
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
No, it sounds more like"I lost a game where the Prince kept my assassin locked down and I couldn’t convert anymore, and the Neutral Killer died Day 2 by King-reveal. They then locked down my assassin while the investigators looked for my conversion and myself. Due to the presence of healers, nightshade was useless. Their invests invested until they got us both, then we got killed."
I was in a game where Prince jailed Assassin continuously from Day 1(no kills). Reaper was found by King N1. The other Unseen was found Night 3, then Prince told us not to execute them and to look for MM instead. I don’t need to tell you why they lost, do I?
It is even worse for the Cult. If the Cult Leader gets locked down by prince it is game over no matter how good your play was(the solution there is simply to allow the CL to suicide)
